## PlayerCameraEventPayloads."PLAYER\_CAMERA.FACE\_ENTITY" property

Emitted when the camera faces an entity (one-time rotation).

**Signature:**

```typescript
[PlayerCameraEvent.FACE_ENTITY]: {
        playerCamera: PlayerCamera;
        entity: Entity;
    };
```
